summary: This document contains the 2012 Schedule K-1 for AL Partners, LLC, detailing the partnership's income, deductions, and credits for tax purposes. It includes information about the partner, Blue Chip Capital LLC, and summarizes their share of the partnership's financials, which indicates a significant loss for the year.

persons.name: Elliot L. Kaplan
persons.context: Elliot L. Kaplan is the CPA who prepared and sent the Schedule K-1 to Blue Chip Capital LLC, summarizing their financial information from the partnership.

persons.name: Blue Chip Capital LLC
persons.context: Blue Chip Capital LLC is identified as a partner in AL Partners, LLC, and is the recipient of the Schedule K-1 detailing their financial share.

connections.description: Elliot L. Kaplan, as the CPA, provides tax preparation services to Blue Chip Capital LLC, which is a partner in AL Partners, LLC.

keyFacts: The document is a Schedule K-1 for the year 2012, indicating financial details for AL Partners, LLC.
Blue Chip Capital LLC reported a loss of $100,000 for the year 2012.
Elliot L. Kaplan is the CPA who prepared the K-1 and communicated with Blue Chip Capital LLC regarding their tax information.
The K-1 was filed with the IRS as part of the U.S. Partnership Return of Income, Form 1065.
The document includes various financial details such as income, deductions, and credits relevant to the partnership.
